note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Share of the population with an eating disorder, males vs. females
subtitle: Estimated share of people who have an [eating disorder](#dod:eating_disorder) (only includes anorexia nervosa and bulimia nervosa) in the past year, whether or not they were diagnosed, based on representative surveys, medical data, and statistical modelling.
